fields.name: icon
fields.comment: base64 128x1128 image for the guild icon

fields.name: owner_id
fields.comment: user id to transfer guild ownership to (must be owner)

fields.name: splash
fields.comment: base64 16:9 png/jpeg image for the guild splash (when the server has the INVITE_SPLASH feature

fields.name: discovery_splash
fields.comment: base64 16:9 png/jpeg image for the guild discovery splash (when the server has the DISCOVERABLE feature)

fields.name: banner
fields.comment: base64 16:9 png/jpeg image for the guild banner (when the server has the BANNER feature)

fields.name: system_channel_id
fields.comment: the id of the channel where guild notices such as welcome messages and boost events are posted

fields.name: rules_channel_id
fields.comment: the id of the channel where Community guilds display rules and/or guidelines

fields.name: public_updates_channel_id
fields.comment: the id of the channel where admins and moderators of Community guilds receive notices from Discord

fields.name: preferred_locale
fields.comment: the preferred locale of a Community guild used in server discovery and notices from Discord; defaults to "en-US"

todo.name: description
todo.comment: the description for the guild, if the guild is discoverable
